name: Hacked (itch) (impojr)
description:
Hacked

This stealth 2D prototype is inspired by the mechanics of Sombra from Overwatch. Infiltrate the mysterious building using your stealth, translocator, and hacking mechanics!

This was a joint effort between Adrian Impedovo and Samantha Handley.
